I would still say that's a lot better

well what I say about that is uh uh
going in and dealing with with
information in China right now is very
similar to doing business in apartheid
South Africa there's something really
wrong there human rights violations
going on and uh people uh used to argue
uh back and forth about whether it was

well look we're we're better the Chinese

there trying to be a positive force for

that's a legitimate thing to say but I

um uh what are you doing there right
what are you doing to to help help and
and Google has some answers for that I
mean one of the things that they do is
they don't store any uh user data within

don't have Gmail servers in China things

information in China wow that's very
